titleStmt.title: A character of Charles the Second written by an impartial hand, and exposed to publick view for information of the people.
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Samuel, Sir, d. 1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Gabriel Bedell, and are to be sold at the Middle Temple Gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: An impartial hand = Sir Samuel Tuke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Middle Temple Gate in Fleetstreet
